main_definition: To give permission or make something possible.

meanings_and_examples.example: My parents allow me to go out with my friends on weekends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Makes it possible for something to happen or be done.
meanings_and_examples.example: The new policy allows employees to work from home twice a week.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Allows room for growth, development, or change.
meanings_and_examples.example: She allowed herself time to recover after the injury before returning to training.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Permits something that is generally not permitted by default.
meanings_and_examples.example: The emergency allows breaking of traffic rules in case of urgent situations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Refers to the capacity or ability of a system, device, or entity to function properly under certain conditions.
meanings_and_examples.example: The new software update allows for faster processing speeds on older devices.
